snippet: Tyrell Brown, 25, arrested on charges of carjacking a Hummer then trying to ram it into police officers near the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge, is being questioned about two killings over the weekend.
abstract: Police arrest Staten Island resident Tyrell Brown on charges of carjacking a Hummer and trying to ram it into police officers near Verrazano-Narrows Bridge; are trying to determine whether he has any connection with two recent killings in the borough.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and MONIQUE O. MADAN

lead_paragraph: Tyrell Brown, 25, arrested on charges of carjacking a Hummer then trying to ram it into police officers near the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge, is being questioned about two killings over the weekend.

headline.main: Staten Island Carjacking Suspect Is Questioned in 2 Killings
headline.print_headline: S.I. Carjacking Suspect Is Questioned in 2 Killings
